column1: Local Foods////Consistantly awesome!  Have visited several times and tried out different menu items
column2: each is always delicious and fantastically prepared.  The crunchy chicken sandwich was very flavorful with sliced/pulled chicken lightly coated in a nut crunch layer
column3: and the pretzel bun just perfect with a fresh tasting crispy outer
column4: and warm fluffy interior.  The lemongrass soup was among the best I've ever had
column6: very smooth with tons of pulled chicken and just the right amount of cilantro.  It was truly outstanding
